department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Medical x ray film illuminators and viewing equipment
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title

Digital Radiography (DR) Image System

## Reference

WS3743819195-Doc3743819245

## Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is soliciting bids for the provision of a Digital Radiography (DR) Image System, as part of the upgrade to the Correctional Service of Canada's radiological equipment.

## Key Details

- **Publication Date**: November 10, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 9, 2022 at 2:00 P.M. Eastern Standard Time
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2023
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Selective tendering
- **Selection Criteria**: The award will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Requirements and Specifications

The procurement is governed by the following UNSPSC code:

- **UNSpsc**: 42201900
- **Description**: *Medical x ray film illuminators and viewing equipment*

## Trade Agreements

* The following trade agreements are applicable to this procurement:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Regions of Delivery

* This procurement is restricted to the province of British Columbia

## Contracting Entity

- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

- **Contact Person**: Samantha Phelan
- **Contact Email**: [samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

You can access the tender notice and supporting documents through the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14595070?extsite=MTQ1OTUwNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14595070?extsite=MTQ1OTUwNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
